sqlMap.select:
/* WmsWHOutbkMgmtSQL.xml > searchWHOutbkInfo */ SELECT S.WOB_BK_NO ,S.SO_NO ,S.CTRT_NO ,dbo.TL_GET_CTRT_NM (S.CTRT_NO) AS CTRT_NM ,dbo.TL_GET_CTRT_CUST_CD (S.CTRT_NO) AS CTRT_CUST_CD ,C.SALES_OFC_CD ,dbo.TL_GET_PIC_NM (C.SALES_PIC_ID) AS SALES_PIC_NM ,S.RTP_NO ,S.WH_CD ,dbo.TL_GET_LOC_NM (S.WH_CD) AS WH_NM ,CASE WHEN ISNULL(S.BK_DATE,'') = '' THEN S.BK_DATE ELSE SUBSTRING(S.BK_DATE, 5, 2) + '-' + RIGHT(S.BK_DATE,2) + '-' + LEFT(S.BK_DATE,4) END AS BK_DATE ,S.ORD_TP_CD ,S.BK_STS_CD ,CASE WHEN ISNULL(S.EST_OUT_DT,'') = '' THEN S.EST_OUT_DT ELSE SUBSTRING(S.EST_OUT_DT, 5, 2) + '-' + RIGHT(S.EST_OUT_DT,2) + '-' + LEFT(S.EST_OUT_DT,4) END AS EST_OUT_DT ,S.LOAD_TP_CD ,S.FWD_DIR ,S.ORDER_REL
,S.OWNER_CD ,dbo.TL_GET_CUST_NM (S.OWNER_CD) AS OWNER_NM ,S.OWNER_ADDR1 ,S.OWNER_ADDR2 ,S.OWNER_ADDR3 ,S.OWNER_ADDR4 ,S.OWNER_ADDR5 ,S.SUPP_CD ,dbo.TL_GET_CUST_NM (S.SUPP_CD) AS SUPP_NM ,S.SUPP_ADDR1 ,S.SUPP_ADDR2 ,S.SUPP_ADDR3 ,S.SUPP_ADDR4 ,S.SUPP_ADDR5 ,CASE WHEN S.SUPP_CD = '' THEN '' ELSE 'S' END AS SUPP_TYPE ,S.BUYER_CD ,dbo.TL_GET_CUST_NM (S.BUYER_CD) AS BUYER_NM ,S.BUYER_ADDR1 ,S.BUYER_ADDR2 ,S.BUYER_ADDR3 ,S.BUYER_ADDR4 ,S.BUYER_ADDR5 ,CASE WHEN S.BUYER_CD = '' THEN '' ELSE 'S' END AS BUYER_TYPE ,S.CUST_ORD_NO ,S.COMMC_INV_NO ,S.DLV_ORD_NO ,S.JOB_NO ,S.RMK ,S.VSL_CD ,S.VSL_NM ,S.VOY ,S.HBL_NO ,S.MBL_NO ,S.CARRIER_CD ,dbo.TL_GET_CUST_NM (S.CARRIER_CD) AS CARRIER_NM ,S.POL ,dbo.TL_GET_LOC_NM (S.POL) AS POL_NM ,CASE WHEN ISNULL(S.ETD,'') = '' THEN S.ETD ELSE SUBSTRING(S.ETD, 5, 2) + '-' + RIGHT(S.ETD,2) + '-' + LEFT(S.ETD,4) END AS ETD ,S.POD ,dbo.TL_GET_LOC_NM (S.POD) AS POD_NM ,CASE WHEN ISNULL(S.ETA,'') = '' THEN S.ETA ELSE SUBSTRING(S.ETA, 5, 2) + '-' + RIGHT(S.ETA,2) + '-' + LEFT(S.ETA,4) END AS ETA ,S.DEL ,dbo.TL_GET_LOC_NM (S.DEL) AS DEL_NM ,CASE WHEN ISNULL(S.EST_CMPL_DT,'') = '' THEN S.EST_CMPL_DT ELSE SUBSTRING(S.EST_CMPL_DT, 5, 2) + '-' + RIGHT(S.EST_CMPL_DT,2) + '-' + LEFT(S.EST_CMPL_DT,4) END AS EST_CMPL_DT ,S.SRC_CD ,(SELECT WAVE_NO FROM TL_WH_WAVE_OB WHERE WOB_BK_NO = S.WOB_BK_NO) AS WAVE_NO ,S.REQ_DEPT ,S.REQ_APPLICANT ,ISNULL(S.SRC_TP_CD, 'WMS') AS SRC_TP_CD ,S.REF_NO FROM TL_WH_OB S LEFT JOIN TL_CTRT C ON S.CTRT_NO = C.CTRT_NO WHERE S.WOB_BK_NO = #c_wob_bk_no#

/* WmsWHOutbkMgmtSQL.xml > searchWHOutbkItemList */ SELECT B.WOB_BK_NO, I.SAO_SYS_NO, I.ITEM_SYS_NO, I.ITEM_SEQ, I.ITEM_CD, I.ITEM_NM, I.LOT_NO, I.ITEM_EA_QTY, I.ITEM_PKGUNIT, I.ITEM_PKGQTY, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM (ISNULL (V.IN_QTY, 0) - ISNULL (V.ALLC_QTY, 0) - ISNULL (V.HOLD_QTY, 0) - ISNULL (V.DMG_QTY, 0) ), 0) FROM TL_WH_INV_ITEM V WHERE V.CTRT_NO = B.CTRT_NO AND V.ITEM_SYS_NO = I.ITEM_SYS_NO AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM TL_WH_ALLC AL WHERE AL.WOB_BK_NO = B.WOB_BK_NO)) AS STOCK_QTY, I.ITEM_CBM, I.ITEM_CBF, I.ITEM_GRS_KGS, I.ITEM_GRS_LBS, I.ITEM_NET_KGS, I.ITEM_NET_LBS, I.INBOUND_DT, I.EXP_DT, I.LOT_04, I.LOT_05, I.FIX_LOT_ID, I.CUST_ITEM_CD, I.SAO_NO, CI.ITEM_REMARK, I.CURR_CD, I.UNIT_PRICE, ISNULL (CI.PKG_LV1_QTY, 0) AS PKG_LV1_QTY, ISNULL (CI.LV1_CBM, 0) AS LV1_CBM, ISNULL (CI.LV1_CBF, 0) AS LV1_CBF, ISNULL (CI.LV1_GRS_KGS, 0) AS LV1_GRS_KGS, ISNULL (CI.LV1_GRS_LBS, 0) AS LV1_GRS_LBS, ISNULL (CI.LV1_NET_KGS, 0) AS LV1_NET_KGS, ISNULL (CI.LV1_NET_LBS, 0) AS LV1_NET_LBS, dbo.TL_GET_WH_PACK_MST_INFO(CI.PKG_LV1_QTY, CI.PKG_LV1_UNIT_CD, CI.ITEM_PKGBASEQTY, CI.ITEM_PKGUNIT , CI.PKG_LV3_QTY, CI.PKG_LV3_UNIT_CD, CI.PKG_LV4_QTY, CI.PKG_LV4_UNIT_CD) AS PKG_INFO, I.INVALID_YN, I.RGST_TIMESTAMP FROM TL_WH_OB B, TL_WH_OB_ITEM I, TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM CI WHERE B.WOB_BK_NO = I.WOB_BK_NO AND B.CTRT_NO = CI.CTRT_NO AND I.ITEM_SYS_NO = CI.ITEM_SYS_NO AND B.WOB_BK_NO = #c_wob_bk_no# ORDER BY I.RGST_TIMESTAMP, I.ITEM_CD, I.ITEM_SEQ, I.LOT_NO

/* WmsWHOutbkMgmtSQL.xml > searchWHOutbkDocList */ SELECT FIELD_NAME, FIELD_VAL, DOC_TYPE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT 'Allocation' AS FIELD_NAME, A.WALC_NO AS FIELD_VAL, 'AL' AS DOC_TYPE, '1' AS DISP FROM TL_WH_OB B, TL_WH_ALLC A WHERE B.WOB_BK_NO = A.WOB_BK_NO AND B.WOB_BK_NO = #c_wob_bk_no# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM TL_WH_WAVE_OB WV WHERE WV.WOB_BK_NO = A.WOB_BK_NO ) UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'Wave' AS FIELD_NAME, A.WAVE_NO AS FIELD_VAL, 'WV' AS DOC_TYPE, '1' AS DISP FROM TL_WH_OB B, TL_WH_WAVE_OB A WHERE B.WOB_BK_NO = A.WOB_BK_NO AND A.WOB_BK_NO = #c_wob_bk_no# UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'Outbound Complete by Booking' AS FIELD_NAME, S.WOB_OUT_NO AS FIELD_VAL, 'OCBK' AS DOC_TYPE, '2' AS DISP FROM TL_WH_OB B, TL_WH_ALLC A, TL_WH_ISSU S WHERE B.WOB_BK_NO = A.WOB_BK_NO AND A.WALC_NO = S.WALC_NO AND B.WOB_BK_NO = #c_wob_bk_no# UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'Load Plan' AS FIELD_NAME, LPS.CONSOL_NO AS FIELD_VAL, 'LP' AS DOC_TYPE, '3' AS DISP FROM TL_WH_OB B, TL_WH_ALLC A, TL_WH_ALLC_ITEM AI, TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP LPS WHERE B.WOB_BK_NO = A.WOB_BK_NO AND A.WALC_NO = AI.WALC_NO AND AI.WOB_BK_NO = LPS.WOB_BK_NO AND AI.SAO_SYS_NO = LPS.SAO_SYS_NO AND AI.PO_SYS_NO = LPS.PO_SYS_NO AND AI.ITEM_SYS_NO = LPS.ITEM_SYS_NO AND AI.LOT_ID = LPS.LOT_ID AND AI.WH_LOC_CD = LPS.WH_LOC_CD AND AI.ITEM_SEQ = LPS.ITEM_SEQ AND B.WOB_BK_NO = #c_wob_bk_no# UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'Outbound Complete by Load Plan' AS FIELD_NAME, LP.LP_NO AS FIELD_VAL, 'OCLP' AS DOC_TYPE, '4' AS DISP FROM TL_WH_OB B, TL_WH_ALLC A, TL_WH_ALLC_ITEM AI, TL_WH_LOAD_PLAN LP, TL_WH_LOAD_PLAN_ITEM LPI WHERE B.WOB_BK_NO = A.WOB_BK_NO AND A.WALC_NO = AI.WALC_NO AND LP.LP_NO = LPI.LP_NO AND LP.LP_STS_CD IN ('P','L') AND AI.WOB_BK_NO = LPI.WOB_BK_NO AND AI.SAO_SYS_NO = LPI.SAO_SYS_NO AND AI.PO_SYS_NO = LPI.PO_SYS_NO AND AI.ITEM_SYS_NO = LPI.ITEM_SYS_NO AND AI.LOT_ID = LPI.LOT_ID AND AI.WH_LOC_CD = LPI.WH_LOC_CD AND AI.ITEM_SEQ = LPI.ITEM_SEQ AND B.WOB_BK_NO = #c_wob_bk_no# ) TB ORDER BY DISP,FIELD_VAL

/* WmsWHOutbkMgmtSQL.xml > searchWHOutbkFileList */ SELECT R.DOC_NO ,R.FILE_ORG_NM ,R.FILE_PATH ,R.FILE_SYS_NM ,R.FILE_SIZE ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),R.RGST_SYS_DT,112) AS UPLOAD_DATE FROM TL_FILE_REP R WHERE 1 = 1 AND R.DOC_REF_NO = (SELECT T.WOB_BK_NO FROM TL_WH_OB T WHERE T.WOB_BK_NO = #c_wob_bk_no#) AND R.DOC_REF_TP_CD = 'WOB' AND R.SVC_TP_CD = 'WB' AND R.DOC_TP_CD = 'WOB'

/* WmsWHOutbkMgmtSQL.xml > searchWHItemCodeInfo */ SELECT T.CTRT_NO ,T.ITEM_SYS_NO ,T.ITEM_CD ,T.ITEM_NM ,T.LOT_NO ,ISNULL(T.ITEM_PKGBASEQTY,0) AS ITEM_PKGBASEQTY /*LEVEL 2*/ ,T.ITEM_PKGUNIT /*LEVEL 2*/ ,T.PKG_LV1_UNIT_CD ,ISNULL(T.PKG_LV1_QTY,0) AS PKG_LV1_QTY ,T.PKG_LV3_UNIT_CD ,ISNULL(T.PKG_LV3_QTY,0) AS PKG_LV3_QTY ,T.PKG_LV4_UNIT_CD ,ISNULL(T.PKG_LV4_QTY,0) AS PKG_LV4_QTY ,ISNULL (T.LV1_CBM, 0) AS LV1_CBM ,ISNULL (T.LV1_CBF, 0) AS LV1_CBF ,ISNULL (T.LV1_GRS_KGS, 0) AS LV1_GRS_KGS ,ISNULL (T.LV1_GRS_LBS, 0) AS LV1_GRS_LBS ,ISNULL (T.LV1_NET_KGS, 0) AS LV1_NET_KGS ,ISNULL (T.LV1_NET_LBS, 0) AS LV1_NET_LBS ,T.ITEM_REMARK ,dbo.TL_GET_WH_PACK_MST_INFO(T.PKG_LV1_QTY, T.PKG_LV1_UNIT_CD, T.ITEM_PKGBASEQTY, T.ITEM_PKGUNIT , T.PKG_LV3_QTY, T.PKG_LV3_UNIT_CD, T.PKG_LV4_QTY, T.PKG_LV4_UNIT_CD) AS PKG_INFO
,UNIT_CURR_CD ,UNIT_PRICE ,ISNULL(PKG_PL_STD_QTY,0) AS PKG_PL_STD_QTY ,ISNULL(PKG_PL_OVER_WGT,0) AS PKG_PL_OVER_WGT FROM (SELECT C.*, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY C.ITEM_CD ORDER BY C.ITEM_SYS_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM C
LEFT JOIN TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM_GRP IG ON C.CTRT_NO = IG.CTRT_NO AND C.ITEM_GRP_CD = IG.ITEM_GRP_CD
WHERE 1=1
AND C.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# AND C.ITEM_CD = #item_cd#
AND C.ITEM_SYS_NO = #item_sys_no#
AND C.ITEM_USE_FLG = 'Y'
AND IG.ITEM_GRP_CD = #item_grp_cd#
AND (IG.ITEM_GRP_CD IS NULL OR IG.ITEM_GRP_CD != #item_grp_cd# )
) T WHERE T.RNUM = 1

/* WmsWHOutbkMgmtSQL.xml > searchPutawayEaQty */
SELECT A.PKG_LV1_QTY AS LVL1_QTY , A.PKG_LV1_UNIT_CD AS LVL1_UNIT , A.ITEM_PKGBASEQTY AS LVL2_QTY , A.ITEM_PKGUNIT AS LVL2_UNIT , A.PKG_LV3_QTY AS LVL3_QTY , A.PKG_LV3_UNIT_CD AS LVL3_UNIT , A.PKG_LV4_QTY AS LVL4_QTY , A.PKG_LV4_UNIT_CD AS LVL4_UNIT FROM TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM A WHERE A.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# AND A.ITEM_SYS_NO = #item_sys_no#
sqlMap.update: /* WmsWHOutbkMgmtSQL.xml > modifyWHOutbkInfo */ UPDATE TL_WH_OB SET CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# ,WH_CD = #wh_cd# ,BK_DATE = REPLACE (#bk_date#, '-', '') ,BK_STS_CD = (CASE #issue# WHEN 'Y' THEN 'I' ELSE #bk_sts_cd# END) ,EST_OUT_DT = REPLACE (#est_out_dt#, '-', '') ,ORD_TP_CD = #ord_tp_cd# ,LOAD_TP_CD = #load_tp_cd# ,FWD_DIR = #fwd_dir# ,ORDER_REL = #order_rel# ,OWNER_CD = #owner_cd# ,OWNER_ADDR1 = #owner_addr1# ,OWNER_ADDR2 = #owner_addr2# ,OWNER_ADDR3 = #owner_addr3# ,OWNER_ADDR4 = #owner_addr4# ,OWNER_ADDR5 = #owner_addr5# ,SUPP_CD = #supp_cd# ,SUPP_ADDR1 = #supp_addr1# ,SUPP_ADDR2 = #supp_addr2# ,SUPP_ADDR3 = #supp_addr3# ,SUPP_ADDR4 = #supp_addr4# ,SUPP_ADDR5 = #supp_addr5# ,BUYER_CD = #buyer_cd# ,BUYER_ADDR1 = #buyer_addr1# ,BUYER_ADDR2 = #buyer_addr2# ,BUYER_ADDR3 = #buyer_addr3# ,BUYER_ADDR4 = #buyer_addr4# ,BUYER_ADDR5 = #buyer_addr5# ,CUST_ORD_NO = #cust_ord_no# ,COMMC_INV_NO = #commc_inv_no# ,DLV_ORD_NO = #dlv_ord_no# ,JOB_NO = #job_no# ,RMK = #rmk# ,VSL_CD = #vsl_cd# ,VSL_NM = #vsl_nm# ,VOY = #voy# ,CARRIER_CD = #carrier_cd# ,HBL_NO = #hbl_no# ,MBL_NO = #mbl_no# ,POL = #pol# ,POD = #pod# ,DEL = #del# ,ETD = REPLACE (#etd#, '-', '') ,ETA = REPLACE (#eta#, '-', '') ,DEL_DT = REPLACE (#del_dt#, '-', '') ,EST_CMPL_DT = REPLACE (#est_cmpl_dt#, '-', '') ,SRC_CD = #src_cd# ,MODI_ID = #user_id# ,MODI_OFC_CD = #org_cd# ,MODI_SYS_DT = GETDATE() ,MODI_LOC_DT = CONVERT(DATETIME, LEFT(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),4) + '-' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),5,2)+ '-' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),7,2)+ ' ' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),9,2)+ ':' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),11,2)+ ':' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),13,2),20) ,REQ_DEPT = #req_dept# ,REQ_APPLICANT = #req_applicant# ,REF_NO = #ref_no# WHERE WOB_BK_NO = #wob_bk_no#
sqlMap.insert: /* WmsWHOutbkMgmtSQL.xml > addWHOutbkInfo */ INSERT INTO TL_WH_OB ( WOB_BK_NO ,CTRT_NO ,WH_CD ,BK_DATE ,BK_STS_CD ,EST_OUT_DT ,ORD_TP_CD ,LOAD_TP_CD ,FWD_DIR ,ORDER_REL ,OWNER_CD ,OWNER_ADDR1 ,OWNER_ADDR2 ,OWNER_ADDR3 ,OWNER_ADDR4 ,OWNER_ADDR5 ,SUPP_CD ,SUPP_ADDR1 ,SUPP_ADDR2 ,SUPP_ADDR3 ,SUPP_ADDR4 ,SUPP_ADDR5 ,BUYER_CD ,BUYER_ADDR1 ,BUYER_ADDR2 ,BUYER_ADDR3 ,BUYER_ADDR4 ,BUYER_ADDR5 ,CUST_ORD_NO ,COMMC_INV_NO ,DLV_ORD_NO ,JOB_NO ,RMK ,VSL_CD ,VSL_NM ,VOY ,CARRIER_CD ,HBL_NO ,MBL_NO ,POL ,POD ,DEL ,ETD ,ETA ,DEL_DT ,EST_CMPL_DT ,SRC_CD ,RGST_ID ,RGST_OFC_CD ,RGST_SYS_DT ,RGST_LOC_DT ,MODI_ID ,MODI_OFC_CD ,MODI_SYS_DT ,MODI_LOC_DT ,REQ_DEPT ,REQ_APPLICANT ,REF_NO ) VALUES ( #wob_bk_no# ,#ctrt_no# ,#wh_cd# ,REPLACE (#bk_date#, '-', '') ,(CASE #issue# WHEN 'Y' THEN 'I' ELSE #bk_sts_cd# END) ,REPLACE (#est_out_dt#, '-', '') ,#ord_tp_cd# ,#load_tp_cd# ,#fwd_dir# ,#order_rel# ,#owner_cd# ,#owner_addr1# ,#owner_addr2# ,#owner_addr3# ,#owner_addr4# ,#owner_addr5# ,#supp_cd# ,#supp_addr1# ,#supp_addr2# ,#supp_addr3# ,#supp_addr4# ,#supp_addr5# ,#buyer_cd# ,#buyer_addr1# ,#buyer_addr2# ,#buyer_addr3# ,#buyer_addr4# ,#buyer_addr5# ,#cust_ord_no# ,#commc_inv_no# ,#dlv_ord_no# ,#job_no# ,#rmk# ,#vsl_cd# ,#vsl_nm# ,#voy# ,#carrier_cd# ,#hbl_no# ,#mbl_no# ,#pol# ,#pod# ,#del# ,REPLACE (#etd#, '-', '') ,REPLACE (#eta#, '-', '') ,REPLACE (#del_dt#, '-', '') ,REPLACE (#est_cmpl_dt#, '-', '') ,'M' ,#user_id# ,#org_cd# ,GETDATE() ,CONVERT(DATETIME, LEFT(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),4) + '-' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),5,2)+ '-' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),7,2)+ ' ' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),9,2)+ ':' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),11,2)+ ':' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),13,2),20) ,#user_id# ,#org_cd# ,GETDATE() ,CONVERT(DATETIME, LEFT(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),4) + '-' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),5,2)+ '-' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),7,2)+ ' ' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),9,2)+ ':' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),11,2)+ ':' + SUBSTRING(dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE(#wh_cd#),13,2),20) ,#req_dept# ,#req_applicant# ,#ref_no# )
sqlMap.select: /* WmsWHOutbkMgmtSQL.xml > searchFileNo */ SELECT 'HJD' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(6), GETDATE(), 12) + dbo.LPAD(CONVERT(NUMERIC, ISNULL(MAX (SUBSTRING(doc_no, 10, 6)), 0) + 1), 6, 0) AS DOC_NO FROM TL_FILE_REP WHERE DOC_NO LIKE 'HJD' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(6), GETDATE(), 12) + '%'
sqlMap.insert: /* WmsWHOutbkMgmtSQL.xml > addFile */ INSERT INTO TL_FILE_REP ( DOC_NO, SVC_TP_CD, DOC_REF_TP_CD, DOC_REF_NO, DOC_REF_NO2, DOC_TP_CD, FILE_PATH, FILE_SYS_NM, FILE_ORG_NM, FILE_SIZE, RGST_ID, RGST_SYS_DT ) VALUES( #doc_no#, #svc_tp_cd#, #doc_ref_tp_cd#, #doc_ref_no#, #doc_ref_no2#, #doc_tp_cd#, #file_url#, #file_sys_nm#, #file_nm#, #file_capa#, #user_id#, GETDATE() )
